info.name: Ello Ello
info.description: A Dark theme for the new social networking site Ello (ello.co).
info.additionalInfo:
Current version:  0.1.4

Dark theme for Ello social networking site.

DISCLAIMER (abridged):  This theme was created entirely from data observed on a private network owned and operated by the style author.  As a consequence all data and network traffic was subject to the security policies of that network.  The author and network operator reserves the absolute right to examine all data transmitted to or through his network for security purposes or for any other purpose.

Full details of the Legal Disclaimer are available in the readme file of the repository on GitHub.


ChangeLog:

Version 0.1.2:  Changed text area background back to black.

Version 0.1.1:  Changed hover link highlight from grey to blue, similar to FT DeepDark theme.

Version 0.1.0:  Essentially just inverting the default black and white foreground and background, then lightening the dark background slightly to make it clearer.
